ComicInfo.Summary: Secrets erupt in utopia as the ultimate heist takes a nasty turn. Marne and Bones are caught by a super-rich cop whose relationship to them proves both shocking and deadly. What follows is a chase through toxic-rain-stained streets, the smoldering underground and cyberspace, and someone's not going to make it to the finish line. Written by novelist Richard Kadrey (Sandman Slim series, Butcher Bird), Illustrated by the Pander Brothers (Grendel, Secret Broadcast, Triple-X International).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-28 19:36:04. [CVDB425229]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Arnold Pander, Jacob Pander, Arnold Pander, Jacob Pander
ComicInfo.Inker: Arnold Pander, Jacob Pander, Arnold Pander, Jacob Pander
